projects.title: InstaVibe: Social Media Platform
projects.description: Experience the InstaVibe - A vibrant social media platform inspired by Instagram, crafted with GraphQL, Node.js, React, and Postgres.

projects.title: CodeWings: Java Subset Compiler
projects.description: Unleash the CodeWings - A powerful Java subset compiler leveraging tokenization and automata concepts, powered by C++ magic.

projects.title: NoteZap: Lightning-Fast Note Taking App
projects.description: NoteZap - A lightning-fast note-taking app built with React, Node.js, AWS Serverless, Cognito, DynamoDB, and TypeScript.

projects.title: Microservices E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Welcome to Shoppify - A cutting-edge microservices e-commerce platform featuring Node.js, MySQL, MongoDB, Docker, Kubernetes, Kafka, and React.

projects.title: RustWave: Powerful Rust Server
projects.description: Dive into RustWave - A robust server built with the extraordinary Rust programming language and its fundamental concepts.
